entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @joncoopertweets This is indeed a very good education for the gullible far-right  elements in our country, who are refusing to safeguard their lives, some of them putting their trust in a con man, others believing that their faith gives them immunity from #Covid19.
